snippet: As part of the Transit Museum’s celebration of Valentine’s Day at Grand Central Terminal, Metropolitan’s Alan Feuer will be reading from his Missed Connections poetry.
lead_paragraph: As part of the Transit Museum’s celebration of Valentine’s Day at Grand Central Terminal, Metropolitan’s Alan Feuer will be reading from his Missed Connections poetry.

headline.seo: Alan Feuer to Read Missed Connections Poetry at Grand Central Terminal
headline.main: Love and the 7:04 to White Plains
headline.print_headline: Love and the 7:04 to White Plains
